kpi.name: sgsn_768b
kpi.formula: (iumm1.iu_succ_in_inter_sgsn_ra_upd + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_3 + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_6 + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_7 + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_9 + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_10 + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_11 + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_12 + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_13 + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_14 + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_15 + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_prot_err + iumm1.iu_inter_sgsn_rau_f_oth_cause + iumm1.iu_fail_inter_sgns_rau_22)

kpi_info.title: Iu Inter SGSN RAU attempts
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the amount of inter SGSN routing area update attempts from Iu interface
kpi_info.formula:
sum(IU_SUCC_IN_INTER_SGSN_RA_UPD +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_3 +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_6 +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_7 +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_9 +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_10 +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_11 +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_12 +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_13 +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_14 +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_15 +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_PROT_ERR +
IU_INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_OTH_CAUSE +
IU_FAIL_INTER_SGNS_RAU_22)
